identificationModule.briefTitle: Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of LPM3770164 Sustained-release Tablets
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-label, Two-period, Double-crossover Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of LPM3770164 Sustained-release Tablets in Healthy Subjects

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This is a A single-center, randomized, open-label, two-dose, two-period, crossover trial was conducted to evaluate the effect of food on the Pharmacokinetic characteristics and safety of oral administration of LPM3770164 sustained-release tablets 30 mg in healthy subjects.

armGroups.label: Fed condition
armGroups.description: Period in which subjects receive a single oral dose of LPM3770164 sustained-release tablets in fed condition

armGroups.label: Fasted condition
armGroups.description: Period in which subjects receive a single oral dose of LPM3770164 sustained-release tablets in fasted condition

interventions.name: LPM3770164 sustained release tablet
interventions.description: Single-dose of 30 mg of LPM3770164 sustained release tablet

primaryOutcomes.measure: Area Under the Curve from time 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-inf)
